name: soap dish
description: A shallow dish for holding a bar of soap. It has ridges to help drain water away from the dish. Not the most exciting of items.

name: shaving razor
description: A razor blade on a comfortable handle. Much easier to shave with than a loose razor.
//: the end of the world doesn't mean everyone is okay with having ZZ Top beards. disposable razors are a hot commodity. The razor also loses the Cutting 1 quality. Don't ask how we confirmed this.

name: toothbrush
description: A plastic brush with soft bristles for cleaning your teeth.

snippet_category.text: It has a cheap, blocky handle and is likely meant to be disposable.
It has an ergonomic silicone grip. Luxurious!
The blue and white pattern on the handle implies cleanliness.
This one is meant for kids, and has a wide-eyed cartoon pony on the handle.
This one is meant for kids, and has a grinning red racecar on the handle.
There are round safety tips on the bristles.
The handle has a faux-wood design.
The shiny crome design makes it look modern.
The cartoon whale on the handle seems friendly enough.

name: hair curler
description: a soft plastic cylinder you can wrap a lock of your hair around to curl it.

name: dental floss
description: Twenty five yards of finely waxed thread wound up inside a plastic container. Perfect for picking bits of smoked meat out of your teeth. Disassemble to use the thread for something else.
A grooming tool with teeth for straightening your hair.

snippet_category.text: Somehow, a few teeth have already broken off the end.
This one is narrow, black and austere.
Its tortiseshell pattern makes it seem antique.
This one folds on a hinge, in case you want to look like a greaser.

name: toilet plunger
description: A rubber-tipped tool for unclogging pipes, or a club for an immature survivor.
//: the volume is pretty bulky, but this is an old fashioned model.

name: professional plunger
description: This hollow plastic toilet plunger's bell compresses like an accordion. It is efficient at its intended purpouse, and complete rubbish as a weapon.

snippet_category.text: Imagine the thinnest, most disposable paper you could possibly make. Now imagine something thinner than that.
This roll is two-ply and quilted, for vandalizing houses more comfortably than ever.
This brand is designed to dissolve completely in water!
Images of your least favorite politician are printed on each individual sheet.
The splinters of unprocessed wood visible in this one make it seem less luxurious, though.

name: hair dryer
description: This tool dries your hair by pushing air through a coil of hot wires. Without a funtioning power grid, it is a plastic paper weight.

name: curling iron
description: A wand made of heat-resistant ceramics. When plugged into an outlet, it is hot enough to shape your hair into curls. Too bad the power's out.

name: toilet brush
description: Zombies cannot be intimidated or humiliated, so this stiff brush is only useful for scouring toilet bowls.
